Title: Lapachhapi
Writer: Archana Kelkar Deshmukh (additional dialogue by), Vishal Furia (story), Vishal Kapoor (dialogue), Vishal Kapoor (screenplay)
Actors: Vikram Gaikwad, Usha Naik, Pooja Sawant
Plot: A new-born Indian baby... An age-old horror practice and the fact how evil are certain human practices
